entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 01 January 2023
